Package mystars.entities

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • mystars.entities.Entity
      • mystars.entities.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Course
extends Entity
    This class performs all the functions required for courseController. It inherits from the Entity class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Course

        public Course​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String courseCode,
              School school,
              int au)
       throws AppException
        Creates an instance of Course. Ensures that courseCode is unique.
        Parameters:
        name - The Course's name.
        courseCode - The Course Code.
        school - The Course's school.
        au - The number of AUs this Course is worth
        Throws:
        AppException - If a course with courseCode already exists.

                         int maxEnrolled)
                  throws AppException

      • getIndex

        public Index getIndex​(int indexNo)
               throws AppException
        Retrieves an Index identified by indexNo if it exists
        Parameters:
        indexNo - The Index's index number
        Returns:
        The Index with the corresponding index number
        Throws:
        AppException - If the index number is not found in this course

      • createLesson

        public void createLesson​(int indexNo,
                         LessonType lessonType,
                         Day day,
                         java.lang.String location,
                         java.lang.String groupNo,
                         boolean[] week,
                         int startPeriod,
                         int endPeriod)
                  throws AppException
        Creates a new lesson with the provided parameters
        Parameters:
        indexNo - The index number that the lesson belongs to
        lessonType - The lesson's lesson type
        day - Which day the lesson is on
        location - The location the lesson is at
        groupNo - The group number the lesson belongs to
        week - Whether the lesson falls on odd or even
        startPeriod - The starting time when the lesson begins
        endPeriod - The ending time when the lesson begins
        Throws:
        AppException - if the index number is not found in the index
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed to the constructor of Lesson

        Returns:

      • register

        public boolean register​(Student student,
                        int indexNo)
                 throws AppException
        Registers the student to the target index
        Parameters:
        student - The student to be registered in the index
        indexNo - The index number of the index that the student is to be registered to
        Returns:
        true if student was successfully registered, or false if the student was placed on the waitlist
        Throws:
        AppException - if the student is already registered for index indexNo

      • drop

        public Index drop​(Student student)
           throws AppException
        Drops the student from the target index.
        Parameters:
        student - The student that wants to drop the index.
        Returns:
        the index the student was removed from
        Throws:
        AppException - if the student is not in the index that the student wants to drop.

      • assertSwopIndex

        public void assertSwopIndex​(Student studentA,
                            int indexNoA,
                            Student studentB,
                            int indexNoB)
                     throws AppException
        Asserts that studentA can swop indexNoA with studentB's index, indexNoB
        Parameters:
        studentA - The first student that wants to swop index
        indexNoA - The index that the first student wants to swop
        studentB - The second student that wants to swop index
        indexNoB - The index that the second student wants to swop
        Throws:
        AppException - If indexNoA and indexNoB are the same
        AppException - If studentA is not enrolled in indexNoA
        AppException - If studentB is not enrolled in indexNoB

      • swopIndex

        public void swopIndex​(Student studentA,
                      int indexNoA,
                      Student studentB,
                      int indexNoB)
               throws AppException
        Swop indexNoA of StudentA with indexNoB of StudentB.
        Parameters:
        studentA - The first student that wants to swop index
        studentB - The second student that wants to swop index
        indexNoA - Identifier of Index which Student A would like to swap
        indexNoB - Identifier of Index which Student B would like to swap
        Throws:
        AppException - If invalid parameters are passed in, see assertSwopIndex(Student, int, Student, int)

      • assertChangeIndex

        public void assertChangeIndex​(Student student,
                              int targetIndexNo)
                       throws AppException
        Asserts that student can change index to targetIndexno
        Parameters:
        student - The student that wants to change index
        targetIndexNo - The index number that the student wants to change to
        Throws:
        AppException - If the student is not registered in the current course
        AppException - If targetIndexNo is not found
        AppException - If targetIndexNo of the student has no more vacancies.

      • changeIndex

        public void changeIndex​(Student student,
                        int targetIndexNo)
                 throws AppException
        Change student from their existing index to the index identified by targetIndexNo
        Parameters:
        student - The student that wants to change index
        targetIndexNo - The index number that the student wants to change to
        Throws:
        AppException - if invalid parameters are passed, see assertChangeIndex(Student, int)
